PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-11802019-08-07,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  ,  , 
ActAn Act to enact the Impact Assessment Act and the Canadian Energy Regulator Act, to amend the Navigation Protection Act and to make consequential amendments to other Acts
SubjectTransitional Regulations for the Purpose of the National Energy Board Cost Recovery Regulations
PrecisTRANSITIONAL REGULATIONS FOR THE PURPOSE OF THE NATIONAL ENERGY BOARD COST RECOVERY REGULATIONS in order to provide (1) clarity and certainty regarding the continued application of the Regulations as they are applied today during the transition period from the National Energy Board to the Canadian Energy Regulator; and (2) for continuous cost recovery for regulatory oversight provided by the federal regulator over the full lifecycle of federal energy infrastructure including pipelines that cross interprovincial and international borders, international and designated interprovincial power lines.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0300 Publication Date: 2019-08-21
AttachmentsAttachment
